item.title: Getting Started
item.description: This post describes how to set up local environment for editing blog posts. Clone the repository $ git clone --recursive git@github.com:openrm/tech.openrm.jp.git Install Hugo You can follow the instructions here: https://gohugo.io/getting-started/installing/ Create a post $ hugo new posts/some-slug-for-the-post.md Start the server $ hugo server -D
